title: fix: overhaul Polly embeddings, perf, and docs
author: Itachi-1824

gist.headline: Polly's brain upgrade
gist.blurb: Our resident bee bot just got a cortex update. She reads documentation faster, ignores noise better, and finally stopped trying to memorize empty pages.
gist.summary: Overhauled the embedding system with token-aware batching and optimized message handling to reduce latency and improve context retrieval.
gist.impact: Users will notice faster replies and much more accurate answers when asking about documentation or code.
gist.visual_concept: Polly the bee in a cozy study or library, upgrading her knowledge base. She is reading data efficiently. The robot helper is organizing the information.
